extendedInfo.description: Wonder secret weapons "UFO" and spaceship developed by the Nazi scientists during the World War IIThen Nazi spaceships are sent to the "dark side" of the Moon to establish a military base. Their plan isto build a powerful fleet and return to conquer the Earth. Now commander! Lead your panzer army to destorythem.   THE GAME    In this realtime strategy game,you control units such as armoured car,many kinds of tanks,bomber,landmine,    artillery,anti-tank gun.Crush your opponents with clever tactics and do not allow setbacks happen because     enemies will become more and more stronger. In order to win, you must collect points to upgrade your     units(econmic,base,tank's speed,tank's fire power,...)collect air-dropped material as much as     possible, produce units to destory your enemies and conquer your enemy's base. Many Classic Panzer     Tanks(Tiger Panther T-34  M4A1  M26) and famous battle scenes in game.  FEATURES   -Choose 3 camps:American,German,or Soviet.   -3 difficulty settings   -27 types of panzer units   -48 missions   -upgrade system(15 parts)   -9 military music as bgm   -many air-dropped materials for scramble

reviews.title: Love it but hate it and go buy it.....
reviews.comment: It\'s a good game, would really love to have tank rolling sound and hp bar for each unit.... That would really make the game more fun....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Respond
reviews.comment: The game is listed as compatible with the Nexus 7, but it doesn\'t fill the screen, nor respond to any keystrokes. Really disappointed, have always enjoyed and extolled the virtues of Easy tech games, but this offering on the tablet is a dud. DO NOT BUY FOR THIS PLATFORM!  Have played the game as Panzer Elite on the iPhone as and it is fine, as a re-badged Panzer War (not on unresponsive menu screen) it just doesn\'t function. Waste of money, if only I\'d attempted to play it within the 15min refund window!
reviews.author: Ian Bowes

reviews.title: Suckd
reviews.comment: This game wont start    Uninstalling too bad i  cant get  a refund wasted my moneh >:
reviews.author: Martin Reyes

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: No longer getting updates i bet. But whats there will keep you going a while. Dont make references to plants vs zombies as this is a totally different game. Quick non stop action is the order here
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Although it doesn\'t take up the whole screen on the HTC sensation

reviews.comment: Useless because does not fill large screen phones about half inch from both sides missing developer fix and will buy
